desc: Amazing Optical has been serving the Mississauga community since 2004. We offer a wide selection of prescription glasses, sunglasses, contact lenses, safety and sports goggles. We carry quality and designer products and only use the best suppliers to provide durable lenses.

layout.text: Amazing Optical is a family owned business and has been serving the Mississauga community since 2004. We offer a wide selection of prescription glasses, sunglasses, contact lenses, safety and sports goggles. We carry quality and designer products and only use the best suppliers to provide durable lenses. Feel free to visit our store for a personal consultation.
